__e: I know who you are, Amanda Vaughn, and I'm quite all right with it.
Mr. Vaughn and your father will be informed at the earliest possible opportunity.
Actually, it's just you and me and Vaughn... and a hundred of his closest friends!
I mean, Vaughn's crazy, but... not that crazy.
Vaughn is the only one who can put me in a room with him.
Michael Vaughn is just a boy who was never good enough for you anyway.
Now I know Vaughn helped choose me.
Agent Vaughn has trouble sleeping when you're in the field.
A month ago, Vaughn found a journal that belonged to his father.
